Package com.varmateo.yawg.freemarker

Classes implementing a PageTemplateService based on the Freemarker library.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FreemarkerDataModel
    Java bean for passing data to the Freemarker template engine.
    FreemarkerDataModel.YawgFreemarkerDataModel
    This is a class that provides the right getters in order to have the appropriate template variables visible inside the Freemarker templates.
    FreemarkerTemplateService
    Creates templates based on the Freemarker template engine.
    FreemarkerTemplateServiceFactory  

Package com.varmateo.yawg.freemarker Description

Classes implementing a PageTemplateService based on the Freemarker library.

Documentation on the Freemarker library is available at http://freemarker.org/docs/pgui.html.
